caption:
Maybe the problem isn’t that love ran out…
But that repentance did.
Marriage doesn’t fall apart because of a lack of feelings—
It breaks when we stop dying to self.
A Christ-centered marriage requires daily surrender.
You’ll either deny yourself or deny the cross.
One leads to unity. The other leads to ruin.
.
#BiblicalMarriage #ChristCenteredMarriage #DieToSelf #MarriageGodsWay #KingdomCouple #MarriageMatters #SelfDenial #Repentance #ChristianWife #FaithfullyFeminine #MarriageDiscipleship #GodFirstMarriage #MarriageAdvice #JesusAtTheCenter #MarriageMinistry
